entities.paths

Class DP_DecisionSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.paths.DP_DecisionSet

  • public class DP_DecisionSet
extends Object
    Class that represents a set of decisions (outgoing edges in the DP graph), each one leading to a different target. The source is not specified so that the object may be shared by multiple sources. Contains data structures used by various any-k algorithms (initially null).
    Author:
    Nikolaos Tziavelis
    See Also:
    DP_State_Node.share_decisions(entities.paths.DP_State_Node)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      DP_Decision best_decision
      The decision that can lead to the optimal cost.
      ArrayList<DP_Decision> list_of_decisions
      The decisions stored as a list.
      int next_idx
      The index in the sorted list of decisions of the next element to be found by DP_Quick.
      boolean partial_order_computed
      For Anyk-Part variants: flag is set to true when we are done computing successors for this set of decisions.
      Stack<Integer> pivot_stack
      A stack that stores the indexes of the pivot elements used by DP_Quick.
      PriorityQueue<DP_Decision> pq_lazysort
      A priority queue that is used to incrementally sort the set of decisions by DP_Lazy.
      PriorityQueue<DP_Suffix_Solution> pq_rec
      PQ data structure used by DP_Recursive.
      DP_Suffix_Solution rec_best_suffix
      Needed for DP_Recursive (includes a decision from this set).

    • Field Detail

      • list_of_decisions

        public ArrayList<DP_Decision> list_of_decisions
        The decisions stored as a list.

      • best_decision

        public DP_Decision best_decision
        The decision that can lead to the optimal cost. It is computed during the bottom-up phase.

      • partial_order_computed

        public boolean partial_order_computed
        For Anyk-Part variants: flag is set to true when we are done computing successors for this set of decisions. Useful when multiple parents share the same DecisionSet because only one parent has to compute the successor order.
        See Also:
        DP_Part.get_successors(entities.paths.DP_Decision)

      • pq_lazysort

        public PriorityQueue<DP_Decision> pq_lazysort
        A priority queue that is used to incrementally sort the set of decisions by DP_Lazy.

      • pivot_stack

        public Stack<Integer> pivot_stack
        A stack that stores the indexes of the pivot elements used by DP_Quick.

      • next_idx

        public int next_idx
        The index in the sorted list of decisions of the next element to be found by DP_Quick.

      • pq_rec

        public PriorityQueue<DP_Suffix_Solution> pq_rec
        PQ data structure used by DP_Recursive.

      • rec_best_suffix

        public DP_Suffix_Solution rec_best_suffix
        Needed for DP_Recursive (includes a decision from this set).

        public DP_DecisionSet()

        public void add(DP_Decision new_decision)
        Parameters:
        new_decision - Decision to be added to the set.
